pgTitle: Provincial Finance and Accounts Service (Uttar Pradesh)
tableCaption: The salary structure of the Provincial Finance and Accounts Service Officer

headers.text: Some Positions in the Government of Uttar Pradesh

rows.text: Senior administrative grade (Above Super time scale) (pay level 14)
finance controller in any big department, directorate or agency, director in any directorate of finance department, special secretary in finance department

finance controller in any small department, directorate or agency, additional director in any directorate of finance department, additional commissioner (finance, treasury and pensions), joint secretary in finance department

finance controller in any small department, directorate or agency, additional director in any directorate of finance department, additional commissioner (finance, treasury and pensions), joint secretary in finance department
chief finance and account officer, joint director in any directorate of finance department, chief treasury officer, deputy secretary in finance department
finance and account officer, deputy director in any directorate of finance department, senior treasury officer
finance and account officer, deputy director in any directorate of finance department, treasury officer
